answers.answer: If your son wasn't fasting when you did the blood sugar test,  it sounds like it is probably okay - a "random" blood sugar test should be below 200 as i understand it.Does he have an insatiable thirst?  A 3 year old who has to urinate often doesn't necessarily indicate diabetes - he could just be deciding to use the toilet a lot as a strategy not to have bladder accidents.

question: my son is 3. I have both maternal and paternal grandfathers that are diabetic. Also a paternal great grandfather, I no a few signs of diabetes since my fiance is a diabetic however, he is not my sons biological father, Lately my sons eating habbit has changed to where he dont want to eat, and he says he has to potty alot (urinate). I checked his blood sugar it was 183> What is going on
title: diabetes in kids
